devdoc.author: Bertrand Rioux

acceptTransaction(address,address,uint25.details: Accept a pending transaction in escrow.

params._carbon: signed integer carbon transfer, (+) for send gold to receiver, (-) to request gold transfer to sender.
params._gold: signed integer gold transfer, (+) for send gold to receiver, (-) to request gold transfer to sender.

params.carbon: The amount of carbon in KG CO2e

constructor.details: Constructor set deployer as owner and as a governor

params.mswfactory: MultisigWalletFactory address used by this contract to setup escrow wallets

createEscrow(address).details: Create an escrow account with you and the receiver

createTransaction(address,int256,int256).details: Create a transaction request to transfer carbon and gold using escrow.

params._carbon: Signed integer carbon transfer, (+) for send gold to receiver, (-) to request gold transfer to sender.
params._gold: Signed integer gold transfer, (+) for send gold to receiver, (-) to request gold transfer to sender.

findEscrowAddr(address,address).details: find escrow account with you and the receiver.

getTransactionIds(address,uint256,uint25.details: Function to return all existing escrow transactions between 2 entities.

lockOffset(uint256).details: Function to burn stamped carbon (gold) to register it as a locked offset.

signUp(string).details: Register wallet with the CAT network

transactionData(address,uint256).details: Get the external multisig transaciton data for an escrow transaction

devdoc.title: Contract which executes trade between 2 entities via escrow.

createTransaction(address,int256,int256).notice: In future will include escrow address as this willnot be stored in the contract

findEscrowAddr(address,address).notice: Will be dropped in future deployments. This data is to be stored/managed by the client

userdoc.notice: You can use this contract for transacting carbon inventories and carbon offset credits (tokens) derived from them.
